## Overview

This document tests `logolink` under the different experiments set in the *Wolf Sheep Predation* model, included in NetLogo along with the *Sample Models* library.

## Set the Environment

### Load Packages

```{r}
library(logolink)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

### Set Model Path

```{r}
model_path <-
  find_netlogo_home() |>
  file.path(
    "models",
    "Sample Models",
    "Biology",
    "Wolf Sheep Predation.nlogox"
  )
```

## BehaviorSpace Combinatorial

```{r}
experiment <- "BehaviorSpace combinatorial"
```

```{r}
results <-
  model_path |>
  run_experiment(
    experiment = experiment,
    other_arguments = c("--threads 8")
  )
```

```{r}
results |> glimpse()
```
